fields.code:
import os
from migasfree.settings import MIGASFREE_REPO_DIR
url = '#'
alert = 'info'
target = 'server'
result = 0
msg = ''
if os.path.exists(MIGASFREE_REPO_DIR):
    for _version in os.listdir(MIGASFREE_REPO_DIR):
        _repos = os.path.join(MIGASFREE_REPO_DIR, _version, 'TMP/REPOSITORIES/dists')
        if os.path.exists(_repos):
            for _repo in os.listdir(_repos):
                result += 1
                msg += '%s en %s.' % (_repo, _version)
msg = 'Creating %s repositories: %s' % (result, msg)
fields.name: Creating Repositories

fields.code:
from django.conf import settings
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
from migasfree.server.models import MessageServer
url = '/server_messages/'
msg = 'Message Server Delayed' 
t = datetime.now() - timedelta(0, settings.MIGASFREE_SECONDS_MESSAGE_ALERT)
result = MessageServer.objects.filter(date__lt=t).count()
alert = 'warning'
target = 'server'
fields.name: Server Messages Delayed

fields.code:
from django.conf import settings
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
from migasfree.server.models import Message
url = '/computer_messages/'
msg = 'Computer delayed' 
t = datetime.now() - timedelta(0, settings.MIGASFREE_SECONDS_MESSAGE_ALERT)
result = Message.objects.filter(date__lt=t).count()
alert = 'warning'
target = 'computer'
fields.name: Computer delayed
fields.description: Check how many computers are delayed

fields.code:
from migasfree.server.models import Package
result = Package.objects.filter(deployment__id__exact=None).count()
url = '/admin/server/package/?deployment__isnull=True'
alert = 'warning'
msg = 'Package/Set orphan'
target = 'server'
fields.name: Orphaned Package/Set
fields.description: Packages that have not been assigned to any deployment

fields.code:
from migasfree.server.models import Notification
result = Notification.objects.filter(checked__exact=0).count()
url = '/admin/server/notification/?checked__exact=0'
alert = 'warning'
msg = 'Notifications to check'
target = 'server'
fields.name: Notifications to check
fields.description: Server Notifications that must be checked

fields.code:
from django.conf import settings
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
from migasfree.server.models import Message
url = '/computer_messages/'
msg = 'Computer updating now'
t = datetime.now() - timedelta(0, settings.MIGASFREE_SECONDS_MESSAGE_ALERT)
result = Message.objects.filter(date__gt=t).count()
alert = 'info'
target = 'computer'
fields.name: Computer updating now
fields.description: Check how many computers are being updated right now

fields.code:
from migasfree.server.models import Fault
from django.db.models import Q
result = Fault.objects.filter(checked__exact=0).filter(Q(fault_definition__users__id__in=[request.user.id,]) | Q(fault_definition__users=None)).count()
url = '/admin/server/fault/?checked__exact=0&user=me'
alert = 'danger'
msg = 'Faults to check'
target = 'computer'
fields.name: Faults to check
fields.description: Faults not checked. You must check fault when fault is solved
